availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Page. Father of William A. Page, Francis E. Page, John Page, Martha Page, and Mary Page. Farmer in Cumberland County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District 2, p. 189. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District 1, p. 44. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Carver, p. 11.
